name: treatment of spent perfluoropentane | used perfluoropentane | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3005/documentation

This dataset for used perfluoropentane (C5F12) which details the choice of a proxy substance in order to ensure the C5F12 to go into the right waste treatment process. So this dataset is a temporary "translation" process for better quality of the datasets using "used perfluoropentane" as an exchange.

This dataset is a first proxy for assigning the appropriate treatment process to used perfluoropentane.


This dataset doesn't include any specifications, but only a proxy waste/by-product as input.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

flow.name: used perfluoropentane
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

exchanges.description: Proxy - This input is only a proxy exchange in order to bring the perfluoropentane in an appropriate treatment process.
